greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows in which n-th row lists in increasing order all compositions [c_1, c_2, ..., c_q] of n encoded as Product_{i=1..q} prime(i)^(c_i); n>=0, 1<=k<=A011782(n).
comment: All terms first sorted by number of factors give A057335.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..16, flattened
maple: T:= n-> sort(map(x-> mul(ithprime(i)^x[i], i=1..nops(x)), b(n)))[]:
xref: Last elements of rows give A002110.
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 04 2019
